column1: Smoque BBQ////The restaurant is very basic
column2: not a white tablecloth venue by any means. We spoke to the owner
column3: and he was very nice. He told us the story of how the restaurant came about. Interesting story. The employees were all very friendly and accommodating
column4: especially Henry. He said that he was the host. I told him that in a fancy restaurant he would be the maitre d'.
